data.name: About.Text
data.value: Here you can download the employee data in a spreadsheet format (as .XLSX file) in order to edit the data using the Microsoft Excel, LibreOffice Calc or any other compatible software for spreadsheet editing.

data.name: RecaptchaError.Text
data.value: Oh, something went wrong with the reCaptcha! Please check your Internet connection and try again. If problem persists, please contact website administrator.
